main event: An observer sighted a diamond-shaped object emitting a brilliant light that changed colors, located at Camp Hood, Texas on 8 May 1949.
interesting points: The observed object appeared to be 148 ft wide and was reported to have an altitude of 1500 ft., The object had a slow decrease in altitude before it dimmed and disappeared., The sighting lasted for about 9 minutes., The observer was able to track the object through a scope from an artillery position., Weather conditions were clear with a bright moonlight night.
